ygData.subject: appearance, charm song

ygData.messageBody:
Regarding appearance:
As a bard I am interested in my appearance to my audience. Of course
protecting my hide is also important! I am searching for effective
armor which is either invisible or attractive (not a tin pot on the
head) for a female half-elf.

Regarding Solon's Song of the Sirens (Level 27):
Which commands do others use with the charm song? I have concentrated
on /pet attack and /pet guard me. I am committed to practicing this
technique as I was impressed with John Kim's description of its power.
I am improving while using in Cazic-Thule but it is difficult to use!
Please share your tips and suggestions.
